Types

tItem

TYPE tItem RECORD
    
id STRING
key STRING
text STRING
image STRING
iconOpen STRING
iconClosed STRING
state STRING
content STRING
END RECORD

Methods

Attach

FUNCTION Attach(o_parent om.DomNode) RETURNS om.DomNode

Attach Item as a child node to a parent node

 define a_nodes dynamic array of om.DomNode, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 let a_nodes[p_depth] = r_item.Attach(a_nodes[p_depth-1])

Parameters:
o_parent - Parent DOM node
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Set

FUNCTION Set(p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING)

Set Item from parameters

 define   r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 call r_item.Set(r_tree.id, "999", "", "Section 999", "Memory-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is an new for <B>999</B> section")

Parameters:
p_id - Item ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Initial state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node

Update

FUNCTION Update(o_node om.DomNode)

Update node attributes from Item

 define  o_parent, o_child om.DomNode, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 let o_child = o_parent.createChild("Node")
 ...
 call r_item.Update(o_child)

Parameters:
o_node - DOM node

Id_New FUNCTION (p_id:STRING) RETURNS STRING
END RECORD

Methods

Clear

FUNCTION Clear()

Clear record: reset attributes on root node, and delete all children

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree
 call r_tree.Clear()

Collapse

FUNCTION Collapse(p_id STRING)

Collapse node, default is root node (all)

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 call r_tree.Collapse(r_item.id)

Parameters:
p_id - Node ID

FUNCTION Expand(p_id STRING)

Expand node, default is root node (all)

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 call r_tree.Expand(r_item.id)

Parameters:
p_id - Node ID

Init

FUNCTION Init()

Initialize contents of widget

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree
 let r_tree.title = "Title"
 ...
 before input
   call r_tree.Init()

IsVisible

FUNCTION IsVisible(p_id STRING) RETURNS BOOLEAN

Is contents of node visible?

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 if r_tree.IsVisible(r_item.id)
 then
   message "contents of item ", r_item.id, " is visible"
 end if

Parameters:
p_id - Node ID
Returns:
TRUE if visible, else FALSE

Item_Add

FUNCTION Item_Add(p_parentID STRING, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING) RETURNS STRING

Add a child Item to a parent Item

 define  r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem, p_parentId, p_newID integer
 ...
 let p_newID = r_tree.Item_Add(p_parentId, p_id, "", "Section A", "ActivityMonitor-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is content for <B>A</B> section")

Parameters:
p_parentID - Parent Item ID
p_id - Item ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Initial state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node
Returns:
ID of node added

Item_Attach

FUNCTION Item_Attach(p_parentID STRING, r_item tItem) RETURNS STRING

Add a child Item to a parent Item

 define  r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem, p_parentId, p_newID integer
 ...
 let p_newID = r_tree.Item_Add(p_parentId, r_item)

Parameters:
p_parentID - Parent Item ID
r_item - Item record
Returns:
ID of node added

 let p_currentID = r_tree.Item_Delete(r_item.id)

Parameters:
p_id - Item ID

FUNCTION Item_Get(p_id STRING) RETURNS tItem

Parameters:

Update attributes of an Item

Node

FUNCTION Node(p_id STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Returns the om.DomNode by ID

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem, o_node om.DomNode
 let o_node = r_tree.Node(r_item.id)

Parameters:
p_id - Item ID
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Set

FUNCTION Set(p_id STRING, p_field STRING, p_title STRING, p_narrative STRING, p_imagePath STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, po_doc om.DomDocument, po_dom om.DomNode, pf_func FUNCTION (p_id:STRING) RETURNS STRING)

Set tTree from parameters

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree
 call r_tree.Set(r_tree.id, "999", "", "Section 999", "Memory-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is an new for <B>999</B> section")

Parameters:
p_id - Currently selected node ID
p_field - string Form field name
p_title - string Title text
p_narrative - string Narrative or description
p_imagePath - string Local file or URL image prefix
p_iconOpen - string Default ui-icon for open state
p_iconClosed - string Default ui-icon for closed state
po_doc - om.DomDocument DOM document
po_dom - om.DomNode Root DomNode of DOM document
pf_func - Refers to function(p_id string) returns string

Show

FUNCTION Show(p_id STRING, p_show BOOLEAN)

Show or hide a node

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 call r_tree.Show(r_item.id, TRUE)

Parameters:
p_id - Node ID
p_show - TRUE to show, else hide

XML

FUNCTION XML() RETURNS STRING

Get XML string from document

 define p_xml string,
   r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree
 let p_xml = r_tree.XML()

Functions

 define r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree

Returns:

FUNCTION Init()

Initialize the module

 call wc_treecordion.Init()

Node_Add

FUNCTION Node_Add(o_parent om.DomNode, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Attach Item as a child node to a parent node

 define a_nodes dynamic array of om.DomNode, r_tree wc_treecordion.tTree, r_item wc_treecordion.tItem
 let a_nodes[p_depth] = wc_treecordion.Node_Add(a_nodes[p_depth-1], r_tree.id, "999", "", "Section 999", "Memory-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is an new for <B>999</B> section")

Parameters:
o_parent - Parent DOM node
p_id - Item ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - State of node
p_content - Content for this node
Returns:
DOM node of added child
